additionalnotes.value: If fibrinogen is less than 1 g/L or Amylase is greater than or equal to 3 X WLN OR Lipase is greater than WLN: HOLD asparaginase. If fibrinogen is less than or equal to 0.5 g/L OR if fibrinogen is greater than 0.5 g/L AND symptomatic: Give 10 units of cryoprecipitate. Repeat fibrinogen daily until greater than 1 g/L. If mild to severe hypersensitivity reactions, switch to Erwina Asparaginase.

If abdominal pain present 72 hours or longer AND Amylase is greater than or equal to 3 X WLN: Permanently stop asparaginase. If abdominal pain present less than 72 hours AND Amylase less than 3 X WLN: HOLD asparaginase and resume when values return to baseline. If Amylase greater than or equal to 3 X WLN AND no abdominal pain: Check Lipase; if Lipase above normal: HOLD asparaginase. If Fibrinogen less than 1 g/L: HOLD asparaginase. If Fibrinogen is less than or equal to 0.5 g/L OR Fibrinogen is greater than 0.5 g/L and symptomatic: Give 10 units of cryoprecipitate. Repeat Fibrinogen daily until greater than 1 g/L. If mild to severe asparaginase hypersensitivity reactions: switch to Erwinia asparaginase.
